Basic.name: Archmage
Basic.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

Basic.name: Boulderfist Ogre
Basic.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

Basic.name: Dread Infernal
Basic.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
Basic.flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

Basic.name: Fire Elemental
Basic.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

Basic.name: Lord of the Arena
Basic.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

Basic.name: Reckless Rocketeer
Basic.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

Basic.name: Starfire
Basic.flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

Basic.name: Vanish
Basic.text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

Classic.name: Argent Commander
Classic.text: Charge Divine Shield
Classic.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

Classic.name: Avenging Wrath
Classic.text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Classic.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

Classic.name: Blizzard
Classic.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
Classic.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

Classic.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
Classic.text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
Classic.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

Classic.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
Classic.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
Classic.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

Classic.name: Frost Elemental
Classic.text: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
Classic.flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

Classic.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
Classic.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
Classic.flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

Classic.name: Hogger
Classic.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
Classic.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

Classic.name: Holy Fire
Classic.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
Classic.flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

Classic.name: Illidan Stormrage
Classic.text: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
Classic.flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

Classic.name: Kidnapper
Classic.text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
Classic.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

Classic.name: Priestess of Elune
Classic.text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
Classic.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

Classic.name: Savannah Highmane
Classic.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
Classic.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

Classic.name: Siphon Soul
Classic.text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
Classic.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

Classic.name: Sunwalker
Classic.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Classic.flavor: She doesnâ€™t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Donâ€™t worry!

Classic.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
Classic.text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
Classic.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

Classic.name: Temple Enforcer
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
Classic.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

Classic.name: The Beast
Classic.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
Classic.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

Classic.name: The Black Knight
Classic.text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
Classic.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

Classic.name: Windfury Harpy
Classic.text: Windfury
Classic.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

Promo.name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
Promo.flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.
Promo.howToGetGold: This was rewarded to players who helped test the Store during the Beta.

Naxxramas.name: Maexxna
Naxxramas.text: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
Naxxramas.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Unrelenting Rider
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Spectral Rider for your opponent.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Anima Golem
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Dark Wispers
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gazlowe
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever you cast a 1-mana spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Iron Juggernaut
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Lightbomb
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mech-Bear-Cat
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mogor the Ogre
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: All minions have a 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Piloted Sky Golem
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Recycle
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shieldmaiden
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Toshley
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Trade Prince Gallywix
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

Blackrock Mountain.name: Drakonid Crusher
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humaniod. But, like, why?
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Emperor Thaurissan
Blackrock Mountain.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Volcanic Drake
Blackrock Mountain.text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

The Grand Tournament.name: Bolf Ramshield
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

The Grand Tournament.name: Coldarra Drake
The Grand Tournament.text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dark Bargain
The Grand Tournament.text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

The Grand Tournament.name: Enter the Coliseum
The Grand Tournament.text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

The Grand Tournament.name: Grand Crusader
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

The Grand Tournament.name: Justicar Trueheart
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

The Grand Tournament.name: Kodorider
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

The Grand Tournament.name: Master Jouster
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

The Grand Tournament.name: Mogor's Champion
The Grand Tournament.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

The Grand Tournament.name: Mysterious Challenger
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

The Grand Tournament.name: Sea Reaver
The Grand Tournament.text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

The Grand Tournament.name: The Mistcaller
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

The Grand Tournament.name: The Skeleton Knight
The Grand Tournament.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

The Grand Tournament.name: Void Crusher
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.

The Grand Tournament.name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
The Grand Tournament.text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
The Grand Tournament.flavor:
He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.

*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

The League of Explorers.name: Entomb
The League of Explorers.text:
Choose an enemy minion.
Shuffle it into your deck.
The League of Explorers.flavor: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Reno Jackson
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: If your deck contains no more than 1 of any card, fully heal your hero.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Wobbling Runts
The League of Explorers.flavor: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident.  They don't talk about it.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Ancient Harbinger
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Corrupted Seer
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Dark Arakkoa
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Faceless Summoner
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Herald Volazj
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Nerubian Prophet
Whispers of the Old Gods.text:
At the start of your turn, reduce this card's
Cost by (1).

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Scaled Nightmare
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: I like it because it scales.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Skeram Cultist
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Thing from Below
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Thistle Tea
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

Karazhan.name: Book Wyrm
Karazhan.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack.
Karazhan.flavor: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Ivory Knight
Karazhan.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Menagerie Warden
Karazhan.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a_copy of it.
Karazhan.flavor: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Moat Lurker
Karazhan.flavor: He really enjoys lurking and gets a lot of job satisfaction out of it.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Moonglade Portal
Karazhan.text:
Restore 6 Health. Summon a random
6-Cost minion.
Karazhan.flavor: Ain't no party like a Moonglade party â€˜cause a Moonglade party got bears.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Shadow Volley
Karazhan.text: Deal 3 damage to all non-Demon minions.

Karazhan.name: Steal Life
Karazhan.text: Deal 5 damage. Restore 5 Health to your hero.

Tavern Brawl.name: Drakonid Slayer
Tavern Brawl.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever he attacks.

Tavern Brawl.name: Razorgore
Tavern Brawl.text: At the start of your turn, give your minions +3 Attack.

Credits.name: Ben Thompson
Credits.text: Battlecry: Draw some cards. With a pen.

Credits.name: Eric Dodds
Credits.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Pirate and destroy all Ninjas.

Credits.name: Jomaro Kindred
Credits.text: Battlecry: TAKE any cards from your opponent's hand that they don't want.

Credits.name: Mike Donais
Credits.text: Battlecry: Replace all minions in the battlefield, in both hands, and in both decks with random minions.
